product_name: olloclip Quick-Flip Case with 3-In-One Lens - iPhone 5/5s
long_description: The olloclip Quick-FlipTM Case with 3-In-One Lens turns your iPhone 5/5s into an advanced camera that captures beautiful fish-eye, wide-angle and macro images when you're on the go.
short_description: The olloclip Quick-FlipTM Case with 3-In-One Lens turns your iPhone 5/5s into an advanced camera that captures beautiful fish-eye, wide-angle and macro images when you're on the go.
